Class Table.AbstractArrayTable

java.lang.Object
io.github.eutro.wasm2j.embed.Table.AbstractArrayTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExternVal, Table
Direct Known Subclasses:
Table.ArrayTable
Enclosing interface:
Table
public abstract static class Table.AbstractArrayTable extends Object implements Table
A table with an array as the underlying representation.

    • grow

      public int grow(int growBy, @Nullable @Nullable Object fillWith)
      Description copied from interface: Table
      Grow the table by a number of elements, filling it with the given value.

      This operation is allowed to fail (and must fail if the upper limit is exceeded), in which case -1 should be returned.

      Specified by:
      grow in interface Table
      Parameters:
      growBy - The number of elements to grow by.
      fillWith - The value to fill new elements with.

      The old size of the table.
